Adventurer Guildsman:
Welcome, Adventurer!
You have completed a most difficult battle, and I was dispatched from the Adventurer Guild to offer you help. Do you have a Mark of Seal of an Adventurer? If you have marks, I will exchange them for seals, some of which can be exchanged for useful items. Remember, I can only carry out one exchange per person.
I only accept "Mark of an Adventurer - Loyalty." If you have other marks or seals, you will have to find another guildsman.

Exchange your "Mark of an Adventurer - Spirit".
View the list of items that can be exchanged for a "Seal of Spirit".
Exchange a "Seal of Spirit" for a talisman.
Exchange the fragments of a Soul Crystal for a Soul Crystal
Ask about the "Mark of an Adventurer".
"I wish to leave."
